dc_title_s: Offshore Lease Blocks, Gulf of Mexico, Winter 2016
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents offshore lease blocks under U.S. jurisdiction in the Gulf of Mexico. Federal lease blocks are outlined as determined by the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management. Data includes the commodity produced, the lease group, and the date that the block was established. This layer is from Winter Quarter 2016. This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing offshore lease blocks data in the United States and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. Hart Energy Publishing.(2016). Offshore Lease Blocks, United States, Winter 2016. Hart Energy Publishing. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/wr560qy3766 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
